#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t;
	
	cin>>t;
	
	while(t--){
		
		int a;
		int b;
	cin>>a>>b;
	
	int tempa=0;
	int tempb=0;
	  
	  while(a!=0){
	  	  int mod=a%10;
	  	  
	  	 tempa=tempa*10+mod;
	  	 
	  	 a/=10;
	  }
	  
	    while(b!=0){
	  	  int mod=b%10;
	  	  
	  	 tempb=tempb*10+mod;
	  	 
	  	 b/=10;
	  }
	  
	  int total=tempa+tempb;
	   
	   int totrev=0;
	   
	   while(total!=0){
	  	  int mod=total%10;
	  	  
	  	 totrev=totrev*10+mod;
	  	 
	  	 total/=10;
	  }
	   
	  while(totrev%10==0)totrev/=10;
		
		cout<<totrev<<endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
